overview:
Stuart’s an entrepreneur and founder of Fluid Pixel and ImobiGo and enjoys all things technological and mobile.

He’s been running Fluid Pixel since 2007 and has quietly grown the company organically to 5 full time associates based in the North East.

Stuart is co-manager of the Adobe Mobile & Devices User Group in the UK.

In 2008 Stuart spent 6 months in the US with the Kauffman Global Fellowship program, where he spent time at Harvard, MIT and Stanford learning about entrepreneurship from an American perspective.

From this experience he met Dr Tony Solon and embarked on the ImobiGo journey. A year later and ImobiGo has received proof of concept funding from NStar to take it from concept to reality and is currently seeking further investment to take it to market.

Stuart enjoys snowboarding, squash and football and loves to mix with others with the same passion for entrepreneurship.

image.attribution: Stuart Varrall / Fluid Pixel
